title: Orchestration Strategies for Strengthening Social Competencies in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage and grasp of core social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Social studies learning utilizing VR simulations in a restricted technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct historical events and analyze social contexts through VR simulations

Learners collaborate with teachers in technological environments (Google Classroom, Zoom, etc.) to revise weekly learning activity plans at least three times and apply strategies (feedback incorporation, activity time adjustment, etc.) to achieve learner engagement rates of 80% or higher.
Learners can propose creative problem-solving solutions for social phenomena using digital tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
